abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32789501, pmid32804426, pmid32782051, pmid32761838, pmid32616673, pmid32480073, pmid32434945, pmid32791568, pmid32779309, pmid32772281, pmid32791537, pmid32788148, pmid32790661, pmid32789807, pmid32789953, pmid32791519, pmid32434946, pmid32771064
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.18
